document_data.mainbody:
he drow domain was a deity domain that granted divine spellcasters drow spell powers.
Those who worshiped deities of the Dark Seldarine were granted a specific suite of spells, as well as improved reflexes. Novice casters of this domain were able to cast cloak of dark power, clairaudience/clairvoyance, and suggestion. Skilled casters were able to cast discern lies, spiderform, and greater dispelling. Those who had mastered the drow domain could cast word of chaos, greater planar ally, and even gate.
